item.title: AI Adoption
item.description: The process of integrating AI tools and practices into an organization.

item.title: State of AI-assisted Software Development 2025 (DORA Report)
item.description: DORA’s 2025 research on AI’s impact on software development, revealing AI as an amplifier of organizational strengths and weaknesses.
